nodes.text: As someone who carries an epipen for beestings,
cd38(378): As someone who carries an epipen for beestings,
Annot: As someone who carries an epipen for beestings,
I understand that allergies can be serious and life threatening.
cd38(378): I understand that allergies can be serious and life threatening.
Annot: I understand that allergies can be serious and life threatening.
Banning airlines from serving peanuts inflight seems reasonable;
cd38(378): Banning airlines from serving peanuts inflight seems reasonable;
Annot: Banning airlines from serving peanuts inflight seems reasonable;
several posts mention the risk inherent in many people opening bags of peanuts at one time
cd38(378): several posts mention the risk inherent in many people opening bags of peanuts at one time
Annot: several posts mention the risk inherent in many people opening bags of peanuts at one time
(which can easily happen when snacks are served)
cd38(378): (which can easily happen when snacks are served)
Annot: (which can easily happen when snacks are served)
throwing a large amount of dust in the air,
cd38(378): throwing a large amount of dust in the air,
Annot: throwing a large amount of dust in the air,
which could be enough to trigger an allergy in severely allergic people.
cd38(378): which could be enough to trigger an allergy in severely allergic people.
Annot: which could be enough to trigger an allergy in severely allergic people.
However, banning people from carrying on their own snacks does seem to violate their rights,
cd38(378): However, banning people from carrying on their own snacks does seem to violate their rights,
Annot: However, banning people from carrying on their own snacks does seem to violate their rights,
to eliminate what seems like an extremely small risk to allergysufferers.
cd38(378): to eliminate what seems like an extremely small risk to allergysufferers.
Annot: to eliminate what seems like an extremely small risk to allergysufferers.
Nuts are a healthy, portable form of protein,
cd38(378): Nuts are a healthy, portable form of protein,
Annot: Nuts are a healthy, portable form of protein,
and cannot be replaced by pretzels.
cd38(378): and cannot be replaced by pretzels.
Annot: and cannot be replaced by pretzels.
No, being hungry or not eating protein won't kill someone;
cd38(378): No, being hungry or not eating protein won't kill someone;
Annot: No, being hungry or not eating protein won't kill someone;
but, I'm a vegetarian,
cd38(378): but, I'm a vegetarian,
Annot: but, I'm a vegetarian,
and  I fly constantly, often on longhaul international flights, but mainly between the east and west coasts,
cd38(378): and  I fly constantly, often on longhaul international flights, but mainly between the east and west coasts,
Annot: and  I fly constantly, often on longhaul international flights, but mainly between the east and west coasts,
The return flight is 6 ½ hours (plus commute time to the airport);
cd38(378): The return flight is 6 ½ hours (plus commute time to the airport);
Annot: The return flight is 6 ½ hours (plus commute time to the airport);
when time allows, I make something to bring on the flight,
cd38(378): when time allows, I make something to bring on the flight,
Annot: when time allows, I make something to bring on the flight,
but if my mother is having a bad day, that's not always possible.
cd38(378): but if my mother is having a bad day, that's not always possible.
Annot: but if my mother is having a bad day, that's not always possible.

On a recent trip, I didn't have time to eat anything at all the day I flew home; got stuck in traffic and barely made my flight (I was the last one on) so didn't have time to eat or buy anything at the airport; and as we started to taxi, the flight crew announced that we had a nut allergy on board, and that they (JB) would not be serving cashews and requested that we not eat any nuts we may have brought on board.

cd38(378): On a recent trip, I didn't have time to eat anything at all the day I flew home; got stuck in traffic and barely made my flight (I was the last one on) so didn't have time to eat or buy anything at the airport; and as we started to taxi, the flight crew announced that we had a nut allergy on board, and that they (JB) would not be serving cashews and requested that we not eat any nuts we may have brought on board.

Annot: On a recent trip, I didn't have time to eat anything at all the day I flew home; got stuck in traffic and barely made my flight (I was the last one on) so didn't have time to eat or buy anything at the airport; and as we started to taxi, the flight crew announced that we had a nut allergy on board, and that they (JB) would not be serving cashews and requested that we not eat any nuts we may have brought on board.
6 ½ hours feels pretty long at that point!
cd38(378): 6 ½ hours feels pretty long at that point!
Annot: 6 ½ hours feels pretty long at that point!
No, it didn't kill me,
cd38(378): No, it didn't kill me,
Annot: No, it didn't kill me,
but it does seem that if JB hadn't served cashews, the risks involved in one or two people eating nuts they may have brought with them would have been extremely, extremely small....
cd38(378): but it does seem that if JB hadn't served cashews, the risks involved in one or two people eating nuts they may have brought with them would have been extremely, extremely small....
Annot: but it does seem that if JB hadn't served cashews, the risks involved in one or two people eating nuts they may have brought with them would have been extremely, extremely small....
and, NOTHING in life is riskfree.
cd38(378): and, NOTHING in life is riskfree.
Annot: and, NOTHING in life is riskfree.
I understand that people want to minimize the risks for their loved ones,
cd38(378): I understand that people want to minimize the risks for their loved ones,
Annot: I understand that people want to minimize the risks for their loved ones,
but you cannot eliminate the risk completely, regardless of what legislation you put in place.
cd38(378): but you cannot eliminate the risk completely, regardless of what legislation you put in place.
Annot: but you cannot eliminate the risk completely, regardless of what legislation you put in place.
If I ate peanuts at the airport, didn't wash my hands, and then opened the rest room door on the plane immediately before a peanut allergy sufferer, that person could suffer a reaction.
cd38(378): If I ate peanuts at the airport, didn't wash my hands, and then opened the rest room door on the plane immediately before a peanut allergy sufferer, that person could suffer a reaction.
Annot: If I ate peanuts at the airport, didn't wash my hands, and then opened the rest room door on the plane immediately before a peanut allergy sufferer, that person could suffer a reaction.
I can support airlines not serving peanuts/peanut products,
cd38(378): I can support airlines not serving peanuts/peanut products,
Annot: I can support airlines not serving peanuts/peanut products,
thereby eliminating the most likely possible cause of a peanutrelated incident on a flight;
cd38(378): thereby eliminating the most likely possible cause of a peanutrelated incident on a flight;
Annot: thereby eliminating the most likely possible cause of a peanutrelated incident on a flight;
but not restrictions on what people may choose to eat.
cd38(378): but not restrictions on what people may choose to eat.
Annot: but not restrictions on what people may choose to eat.
I agree that telling people they can't bring it on board is a bit much,
ambersky(302): I agree that telling people they can't bring it on board is a bit much,
Annot: I agree that telling people they can't bring it on board is a bit much,
but I definitely thing airlines themselves not offering it is a great step
ambersky(302): but I definitely thing airlines themselves not offering it is a great step
Annot: but I definitely thing airlines themselves not offering it is a great step
(that limits the amount likely to be on board).
ambersky(302): (that limits the amount likely to be on board).
Annot: (that limits the amount likely to be on board).
Also making an announcement that someone actually IS allergic on board and to please try to refrain from opening/eating any nut products during the flight would be nice.
ambersky(302): Also making an announcement that someone actually IS allergic on board and to please try to refrain from opening/eating any nut products during the flight would be nice.
Annot: Also making an announcement that someone actually IS allergic on board and to please try to refrain from opening/eating any nut products during the flight would be nice.
I do think this could lessen the risk a great deal.
ambersky(302): I do think this could lessen the risk a great deal.
Annot: I do think this could lessen the risk a great deal.
My son's allergist told us not to bother with a "peanut free" table for him at lunch at school,
ambersky(302): My son's allergist told us not to bother with a "peanut free" table for him at lunch at school,
Annot: My son's allergist told us not to bother with a "peanut free" table for him at lunch at school,
it gives a false sense of security,
ambersky(302): it gives a false sense of security,
Annot: it gives a false sense of security,
but also not to let him sit RIGHT next to someone eating a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
ambersky(302): but also not to let him sit RIGHT next to someone eating a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
Annot: but also not to let him sit RIGHT next to someone eating a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
So for a lot of people, the airlines not serving it would probably do a lot for them.
ambersky(302): So for a lot of people, the airlines not serving it would probably do a lot for them.
Annot: So for a lot of people, the airlines not serving it would probably do a lot for them.
A peanutfree table is less likely to have smears of peanut butter on/under it.
elizwestley(376): A peanutfree table is less likely to have smears of peanut butter on/under it.
Annot: A peanutfree table is less likely to have smears of peanut butter on/under it.
Risk of exposure is reduced
elizwestley(376): Risk of exposure is reduced
Annot: Risk of exposure is reduced
which is not as good as eliminated but is better than full exposure.
elizwestley(376): which is not as good as eliminated but is better than full exposure.
Annot: which is not as good as eliminated but is better than full exposure.
I see the parallel with these flight proposals.
elizwestley(376): I see the parallel with these flight proposals.
Annot: I see the parallel with these flight proposals.
Ban peanut products.
elizwestley(376): Ban peanut products.
Annot: Ban peanut products.
Yes, people will "sneak" them.
elizwestley(376): Yes, people will "sneak" them.
Annot: Yes, people will "sneak" them.
However, the risk will still be reduced over the nothing that we are doing now.
elizwestley(376): However, the risk will still be reduced over the nothing that we are doing now.
Annot: However, the risk will still be reduced over the nothing that we are doing now.
